channel.title: EdgeScape V4 Soucre Help
channel.description:
[quote="Legendery, post:1, topic:140015"][center][size=20pt]EdgeScape V4[/size][/center]
[url=http://uppit.com/d/NFADR]UppIT Download Link[/url] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=XFGNMLSE]MegaUpload Download Link[/url]
[b][i]EdgeScape V4[/i][/b] Features:
[b]Skills:[/b]
Mining Smithing Theiving RuneCrafting WoodCutting FireMaking Fletching Fishing Cooking
[b]Items:[/b]
Skillcapes Skillhoods Fighter Torso Rune Defenders Rune Partyhat White H'ween Mask Godswords Darkbow <-- Doesn't Hit Twice, I May Update Soon And Re-Release Black Partyhat 3rd Age Melee 3rd Age Range Dragon Full Helmet Dragon Boots
^^ These Items All Work And Weild CORRECTLY.
[b]Minigames[/b]
Pest Control - Requires PestCScape Or MiniGScape Client. Barrows #1 - Go Through Barrows Portal And Kill The Brothers Up Top. Barrows #2 - Go Through Barrows Portal, Dig To The Crypts, Kill The Brothers Or Look For Tunnel Mound, Search Reward Chest. TzTok-Jad - Get An Inventory Of Food, Add Up The Price Of The Loot You Got, FC = 50m Daliganioth Mother - 9K Hp, Hits Over 99 (Players Have 99 HP Max =O) Note - Only EVER Killed By 1 Admin Who Got A Log In-Out-In Safespot.(Drops Rares) Castle Wars - Recent Update, The Fun Minigame In Almost Exact Form.
[b]Other Features[/b]
99/126 Max Stat Correct Weapon Timers Correct Food Timers Over 4000 Char Files SYIPkPker Proof! Much More! Will Add As I Remember Them.
[center][size=15pt]Pictures[/size][/center]
[IMG]http://i200.photobucket.com/albums/aa157/falbafalba/alex1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i200.photobucket.com/albums/aa157/falbafalba/alex2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i200.photobucket.com/albums/aa157/falbafalba/alex3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i200.photobucket.com/albums/aa157/falbafalba/alex4.jpg[/img]
[b]Credits[/b]
75% Legendery (Owner/Coder) 10% Smitty Jr (Co-Owner/Bought 24/7 & Domain Name) 10% I Pk U No (Co-Owner) 5% Hero (Co-Owner)[/quote]Any One Got Link For Commands Or Commands
PS I Want Skillcapes Skillhoods Fighter Torso Rune Defenders Rune Partyhat White H'ween Mask Godswords Darkbow <-- Doesn't Hit Twice, I May Update Soon And Re-Release Black Partyhat 3rd Age Melee 3rd Age Range Dragon Full Helmet Dragon Boots
I DownLoaded Soucre
Any1 Help Plz
